description: A tuple of operations and resources. It is recommended to make sure that all the tuple expansions are valid.

apiGroups.description: The API groups the resources belong to. '`*`' is the wildcard for all groups. If '`*`' is present, the length of the slice must be one.

apiVersions.description: The API versions the resources belong to. '`*`' means all versions. If '`*`' is present, the length of the slice must be one.

operations.description: The operations the admission hook cares about. '`*`' means all operations. If '`*`' is present, the length of the slice must be one.

resources.description:
A list of resources this rule applies to. For example:

- '`pods`': all pods
- '`pods/log`': the `log` subresource of pods
- '`*`': all resources, but not subresources
- '`pods/*`': all subresources of pods
- '`*/scale`': all scale subresources
- '`*/*`': all resources and their subresources.

If a wildcard is present, the validation rule will ensure resources do not overlap with each other. Depending on the enclosing object, subresources might not be allowed.
